settings.name: Speed exceeding movement abilities of the animal(s)
Movebank marked Outliers
settings.description: Tick if you want to remove locations that have been flagged as outliers in Movebank.

settings.name: Future timestamp Outliers
settings.description: Tick if you want to remove locations with future timestamps.

settings.name: Name of variable indicating location error
settings.description: Provide the exact name of the variable indicating location error in your data set. If unsure, please run the first App in your workflow and check the Variable Names in the Output Details overview.

settings.name: Maximum acceptable location error
settings.description: Insert the maximum location error (in meters) that you find acceptable. All higher values will be filtered out.
